name: Aarons v. Public Service Building & Loan Association et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Aarons v. Public Service Building & Loan Ass'n

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Kephart, Schapper, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Aarons v. Public Service Building & Loan Association et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
This appeal involves the same questions as were lately before us in Bennett v. Rittenhouse Short-Term Bldg. & Loan Assn., 313 Pa. 391, where, on the same state of facts, judgment for plaintiff was affirmed on the opinion of the court below. That case controls here.
The order discharging the rule to open judgment is affirmed,
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William C. Hayes, with him William A. Hayes, for appellant.
Emil F. Goldhaber, of Aarons, Weinstein, Stone & Goldhaber, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Aarons v. Public Service Building & Loan Association et al., Appellants.
Argued January 4, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Kephart, Schapper, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
William C. Hayes, with him William A. Hayes, for appellant.
Emil F. Goldhaber, of Aarons, Weinstein, Stone & Goldhaber, for appellee.
January 30, 1934:
